mapper.sql: logid, corptemp_id, corp_id, corp_name, temp_id, temp_name, main_type, sub_type, notice_type, role_id, role_name, send_num, cur_state, interval_time, content, description, level, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_corp_notice_template WHERE 1=1 AND (temp_name = #{temp_name} OR temp_name LIKE '%'||#{temp_name}||'%') '%'+#{temp_name}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{temp_name}, '%')) AND (content = #{content} OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%') '%'+#{content}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')) AND main_type = #{main_type} ORDER BY level,create_time DESC
SELECT FROM as_corp_notice_template WHERE(content = #{fieldCode} OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fieldCode}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_corp_notice_template( logid, corptemp_id, corp_id, corp_name, temp_id, temp_name, main_type, sub_type, notice_type, role_id, role_name, send_num, cur_state, interval_time, content, description, level, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{corptemp_id}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{temp_id}, #{temp_name}, #{main_type}, #{sub_type}, #{notice_type}, #{role_id}, #{role_name}, #{send_num}, #{cur_state}, #{interval_time}, #{content}, #{description}, #{level}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_corp_notice_template SET logid = #{logid}, corptemp_id = #{corptemp_id}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, temp_id = #{temp_id}, temp_name = #{temp_name}, main_type = #{main_type}, sub_type = #{sub_type}, notice_type = #{notice_type}, role_id = #{role_id}, role_name = #{role_name}, send_num = #{send_num}, cur_state = #{cur_state}, interval_time = #{interval_time}, content = #{content}, description = #{description}, level = #{level}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
